abstract: Levi Pettit, Sigma Alpha Epsilon member who was expelled from University of Oklahoma after appearing on video leading racist chant, apologizes for his role in incident and ashamed he participated.
lead_paragraph: A fraternity member expelled from the University of Oklahoma said he was sorry for his role in the videotaped incident and ashamed that he participated.

headline.main: Former University of Oklahoma Student Apologizes for Racist Chant
headline.print_headline: Ex-Student, Apologizing, Admits Chant Was Racist

snippet: A fraternity member expelled from the University of Oklahoma said he was sorry for his role in the videotaped incident and ashamed that he participated.
